fulltext:
Resume – Lê Thị Thiên Thanh 
Tel:  
Address:  
Email:  
Skype:  
Linkedin:  
WordPress Blogs:  
INTRODUCTION 
 6+ years working experience as Project /Product Manager + QA Manager + Digital 
Producer 
 Good digital online products knowlege and hand-on cutting edge technologies and 
media banner designing and advertising campaing 
 Good experience as Project QA Manager & Scrum Master, coordinate with clients 
and willing to take challenges 
 Good English with international experience 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Website development and Advertising Tools 
• Kanban, Scrum, JIRA, GitLabb, Redmine, Merlin, SVN, FPT, Google Double Click, 
Google Spreadsheet and Google (tools + products), Dropbox, Photoshop, QA Tools 
(Banners and eDMs), Basecamp, Snagit… etc 
• Deep understanding UX/UI and Wireframe: Lucid Charts, Invision, Sketch… etc  
• Good knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript 
• Macromedia Dreamweaver 
Computing Skills and Knowledge 
 Microsoft Office: Excel, PowerPoint, Word, Visio, Project… etc 
 Computer Programming Languages: C++ (5 Years Experienced), also HLSL, Java, C#, 
Python 
 Software Libraries APIS: DirectX, OpenGL, Havok (Physics), FMod (Audio), Expat 
(XML) 
 Object – Oriented Methods: OO Analysis and Design, UML, Frameworks, Patterns, 
Cross-Platform… etc 
 Games Development: Game Architecture, Concurrency, Optimization, Code Reuse, 
XML Use…. Etc 
 Real – Time 3D Graphics: Mathematics for 3D, Rendering, Shaders, Animation, 
Lighting / Shadows, Particle. 
 Systems, Post-Processing, Instancing, Spatial Partitioning 
 Software Development: Visual Studio, DirectX, NetBeans… etc 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Ecommerce Technology Products Company (July 2017 – Sept 2019) – Systum Vietnam 
Product QA Manager 
Manage development team, Design and QA team for company enterprise e-commerce 
product. Understand UX/UI and Wireframe of company’s products and using Scrum process 
to manage work cycle. Act as a scrum master and manage sprint planning, demo and 
retrospective meeting and product quality throughout each sprint and across all teams. 
Also, being a bridge communication between team and all stakeholders. 
Webs + Applications Product Company (Jan 2017 – July 2017) – Keaz Vietnam  
Product Manager 
 Managing a team of 10 people for many large products – apps/website (mainly 
car sharing and booking car/taxi like Uber or Grab for big clients Envoy There, 
Glide… etc).  
 Planning and daily meeting the work ahead using scrum methology  
 Arranging resources, managing risks/conflicts and team issues 
 Managing, controlling and monitoring the work and resources.  
 Reviewing the work once it has completed and deliver top quality products to 
clients.  
 Along that is interviews and admin work within the office, make plan to motivate 
team and arrange team building… etc. 
Technology Solutions Company (Oct 2015 – Dec 2016) – Global Outsource Solutions 
Product Manager 
 Managing a small team for a large project implementing a social event app and a 
medium size project that is a website/mobile app for yoga.  
 Main contact point between clients and developers for any technical matters and 
negotiate with client about the estimation.  
 Planning the work ahead and arrange resources and prepare work for resources 
and make sure the work run smoothly. 
 Managing, controlling and monitoring the work and resources.  
 Reviewing the work once it has completed and deliver top quality products to 
clients.    
Digital Marketing Company (Oct 2013 – July 2015) – Studio 60 Vietnam 
Digital Producer 
Most of the projects are digital advertising and digital marketing, include designing flash 
banners, rich media banners & content, eDMs, micro sites and websites 
 Managing a small group of sources. 
 Planning and budgeting project to provide (AOT and timeline). 
 Excuting Jira/tasks management, monitoring and controlling the ongoing projects 
 Handling client change requests.  
 Acting as Scrum Master and managed a small team to develop a large social app 
in a few months.  
Playbox Ltd (2009 – 2011) – United Kingdom 
Programmer 
 England programming graphics systems and image conversion / processing tools for 
computer games. 
EDUCATION 
Bachelor Degree of Software Engineering (2005 – 2008) 
University of Central Lancashire – United Kingdom 
FMIT Project Management PMI Global Standard Certification (2014)

educations.school: University of Central Lancashire - United Kingdom
educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
